title: Virtual Survivorship Day Agenda
description: Join Duke Cancer Institute's Supportive Care & Survivorship Center on Wednesday, June 7 for a full day of virtual interactive events. Participate in live panel discussions and interactive workshops that highlight cancer support and survivorship services.
cleaned_text: Virtual Survivorship Day Agenda Wednesday, June 7, 2023, 9:00 am to 5:00 pm Virtual Survivorship Day took place on Wednesday, June 7, 2023. It included live panel discussions and interactive workshops that highlight cancer support and survivorship services. Recordings of panel discussions are now available to watch below. We have something for everyone, whether you are newly diagnosed, in treatment, have completed treatment, or are a caregiver or friend supporting someone with cancer. Survivorship Day was presented by Duke Cancer Institute's Supportive Care & Survivorship Center If you prefer to attend in person, Survivorship Day events, including workshops, rejuvenation activities, and demonstrations will take place at Duke Cancer Centers in Durham and Raleigh. Registration is free and encouraged. Pre-registration is closed. Please register in-person at the event you wish to attend. Virtual Events Schedule - View the [virtual event agenda](/survivorship-day-virtual-event-information). - Read answers to [frequently asked questions](/survivorship-day-2023-frequently-asked-questions). Survivorship Day
